news.title: China’s Hesai will double production as lidar sensor industry shakes out
news.summary: Hesai said it now plans to build as many as 4 million lidar sensors in 2026, up from 2 million, as it tries to corner a market with one fewer player after Luminar's bankruptcy.

news.title: The 2026 BMW iX3 voice assistant will be powered by Alexa+
news.summary: BMW is finally getting the next-generation Alexa voice assistant and it’s coming with a generative AI upgrade. news.title: Lucid Motors doubled EV output in 2025 after early Gravity SUV struggles
news.summary: Lucid built more than 18,000 EVs in 2025 and delivered more than 15,000 after a tough start to the year -- still a far cry from the high bar it set in 2021.

news.title: Amazon revamps Fire TV, launches its own ‘Artline’ televisions with frames at CES
news.summary: Fire TV's new interface focuses on your content and offers easier, speedier navigation, Amazon says.

news.title: Amazon’s AI assistant comes to the web with Alexa.com
news.summary: Amazon is bringing Alexa+ to the web with a new Alexa.com site, expanding its AI assistant beyond devices and positioning it as a family-focused, agent-style chatbot.

news.title: LG’s CLOiD robot can load the washer for you, slowly

news.summary: Audeze - the headphone-maker now owned by Sony - announced a refreshed version of its Maxwell gaming headset at CES on Monday, offering roomier ear pads that attach magnetically for easy replacement. news.title: Earliest African cremation was 9,500 years ago

news.title: AI Deepfakes Are Impersonating Pastors to Try to Scam Their Congregations
news.summary: Religious communities around the US are getting hit with AI depictions of their leaders sharing incendiary sermons and asking for donations.
